description: Improving efficiency workflows by developing Legal Online, Advance Payment & Corporate Card, Supply Chain, Vendor, HC Online System, improving reporting speed, accuracy and compliance. Enhanced system scalability by implementing Event-Driven Architecture, Tracing & Monitoring and integrating Node.js services with SAP, reducing system error rate by 30%+ and improving troubleshooting speed.

Identified workflow limitations on estimator.id and delivered 12+ new features that improved daily operational usability and addressed core functional gaps. Improved platform stability by refactoring inefficient code sections and resolving recurring technical issues, reducing system errors by 25%.

Analyzed administrative process bottlenecks and developed 2 internal Laravel applications to digitize workflows, reducing manual tasks and improving process turnaround time. Resolved 10+ website issues and produced comprehensive technical & API documentation, enabling smoother maintenance and faster onboarding for future developers.

Designed and built an employee management and online scheduling app for an Australian security company using Laravel (API) and Vue.js (frontend). Implemented automated deployment with GitHub Actions, reducing manual deployment time.

Developed two mobile apps: an employee attendance system and a mental health consultation platform. Built and integrated the backend REST API using Bun Express.js, ensuring seamless mobile app performance.
